version_description:
- Collaborate in real-time on any PDF with Xodo Connect | Invite clients, colleagues, or classmates to work with you from any web browser on any device, no signups, downloads, or installs required

- Convert office documents to PDF (includes Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Pages, Numbers, and Keynote files)

- Convert image files to PDF and use Xodo to view/annotate pictures on the go (includes .tiff, .tif, .jpg, .jpeg, .gif, .png, .bmp, .bmpf, .ico, .cur, .xbm)

- Thumbnail page display mode makes navigation even easier and allows you to delete and reorder pages on the fly

- Create new blank PDF documents and use Xodo as an image-rich notepad 

- Built-in support tool lets you ask questions, provide feedback, or suggest ideas for new features directly from the Xodo app

- Bug fixes

- Collaborate in real-time on any PDF with Xodo Connect | Invite clients, colleagues, or classmates to work with you from any web browser on any device, no signups, downloads, or installs required

- Convert office documents to PDF (includes Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Pages, Numbers, and Keynote files)

- Convert image files to PDF and use Xodo to view/annotate pictures on the go (includes .tiff, .tif, .jpg, .jpeg, .gif, .png, .bmp, .bmpf, .ico, .cur, .xbm)

- Thumbnail page display mode makes navigation even easier and allows you to delete and reorder pages on the fly

- Create new blank PDF documents and use Xodo as an image-rich notepad 

- Built-in support tool lets you ask questions, provide feedback, or suggest ideas for new features directly from the Xodo app

- Bug fixes

- Collaborate in real-time on any PDF with Xodo Connect | Invite clients, colleagues, or classmates to work with you from any web browser on any device, no signups, downloads, or installs required

- Convert office documents to PDF (includes Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Pages, Numbers, and Keynote files)

- Convert image files to PDF and use Xodo to view/annotate pictures on the go (includes .tiff, .tif, .jpg, .jpeg, .gif, .png, .bmp, .bmpf, .ico, .cur, .xbm)

- Thumbnail page display mode makes navigation even easier and allows you to delete and reorder pages on the fly

- Create new blank PDF documents and use Xodo as an image-rich notepad 

- Built-in support tool lets you ask questions, provide feedback, or suggest ideas for new features directly from the Xodo app

- Bug fixes

- Support for opening files from other apps on the device and their iCloud containers.
- Dropbox files now display in the recent files list.
- Stability improvements.

* A new style picker for changing annotation properties.
* Xodo will again open documents based on last page read (changeable in the settings app).
* Improved night mode.
* New icons.
* Improved support for the iPhone X.

* Tapping on the area around pages will now show and hide the toolbars.
* Tapping outside an annotation to deselect it will no longer show or hide the toolbars.

- Xodo now uses a new file browser which gives access to documents stored in other apps on your device, including cloud services such as iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive, Box, OneDrive, etc.
- Includes a new Reader mode that displays the text of the PDF resized for your screen. The text is re-sizeable using the pinch gesture, and text annotations remain visible.
- The UI has been updated with a new layout and visual refinements to make using Xodo more enjoyable.
- Bookmarks are saved into the PDF, so that bookmarks created on Xodo will be accessible using copies of Xodo on other devices.
- Xodo now requires iOS 11 or greater.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes.

- Xodo now uses a new file browser which gives access to documents stored in other apps on your device, including cloud services such as iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive, Box, OneDrive, etc.
- Includes a new Reader mode that displays the text of the PDF resized for your screen. The text is re-sizeable using the pinch gesture, and text annotations remain visible.
- The UI has been updated with a new layout and visual refinements to make using Xodo more enjoyable.
- Bookmarks are saved into the PDF, so that bookmarks created on Xodo will be accessible using copies of Xodo on other devices.
- Xodo now requires iOS 11 or greater.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes.

- Xodo now uses a new file browser which gives access to documents stored in other apps on your device, including cloud services such as iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive, Box, OneDrive, etc.
- Includes a new Reader mode that displays the text of the PDF resized for your screen. The text is re-sizeable using the pinch gesture, and text annotations remain visible.
- The UI has been updated with a new layout and visual refinements to make using Xodo more enjoyable.
- Bookmarks are saved into the PDF, so that bookmarks created on Xodo will be accessible using copies of Xodo on other devices.
- Xodo now requires iOS 11 or greater.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes.

- Can open Office (Word, PowerPoint, Excel) and image files.
- New text search displays a list of all search results in a document.
- Fixes a bug where sharing a PDF to Xodo could sometimes cause a crash.

+ Undo/redo support. (Shake device to undo or redo)
+ Text search highlights all visible results.
+ Date, time, and numeric form fields now a picker specific to the data type.
+ Support for "grouped" annotations.
+ Improved support for opening .docx, .pptx and .xlsx.
+ Bug fix to re-enable night mode.

4.0.1:
- The Apple Pencil will immediately add ink to a document without presenting the pencil tool/color UI.
- Small UI improvements
- Minor bug fixes

- Full support for iOS 13 dark mode

- A number of other UI improvements
- Fixes a number of crashes

4.0.0:
- Support for Apple's beautiful new inking tools
- Full support for iOS 13 dark mode
- A new thumbnail slider bar
- Annotation selection improvements
- Ability to open the viewer from the file browser without opening a new document
- The annotation list now uses color-coded icons

- Improved quality of Apple (PencilKit) markup annotations.
- Xodo now has a new settings panel to customize how Xodo works for you. Click the gear icon at the top left of the file browser.
- Bookmark/Outline/Annotation lists are shown next to the document on iPads.
- Thumbnail view can now filter to show only annotated or bookmarked pages.
- Choose where to save your document when importing PDFs from other apps.
- Full support for iOS 13 text selection gestures.
- Annotations are now selected more quickly when tapped.
- Annotations selected from the list select the annotation rather than flash it.
- Annotations are now more easily precisely repositioned.
- A number of stylistic improvements.
- A number of bug fixes.

NEW:
- All new annotation toolbar system, with several pre-built toolbars with multiple presets
- FreeText annotations now support different fonts, and emoji
- Can display PDFs in sepia
- Ability to create callout annotation

Bug Fixes:
- Asian characters no longer sometimes appear squished
- Other bug fixes

Concurrent annotating and reading is now a seamless experience:
- Scroll and zoom using 2 fingers while using any annotation tool.
- Select and edit other annotations without leaving the current annotation tool.

Apple highlights are more realistic:
- Apple markup/pencil highlights can now be saved to the document in a more realistic way.
   See the setting "Apple Highlighter Mode" to toggle this behavior.

Bug fixes:
- Inks are saved into the document even without finishing the ink when backgrounding the app
- Slight pause after creating an annotation has been eliminated

This release adds:
- A new editing bar above the keyboard when creating or editing a free-text annotations.
- Tapping on a selected free-text annotation will begin editing it
- When editing a free-text annotation, its height will expand vertically for new lines of text

Bug fixes:
- Annotation style presets are now saved and restored properly between app sessions

- When editing a free-text annotation, its height will expand vertically for new lines of text

This release adds:
- A new editing bar above the keyboard when creating or editing a free-text annotations.
- Tapping on a selected free-text annotation will begin editing it
- When editing a free-text annotation, its height will expand vertically for new lines of text

Bug fixes:
- Annotation style presets are now saved and restored properly between app sessions

- Annotations can now optionally be created by the Apple Pencil only. This will enable full palm rejection, and allow you to use a single finger to scroll, while continuing to annotate with the Apple Pencil. (Bluetooth permission required to check that the Apple Pencil is paired.)
- Shape annotations can now be created with a single finger tap
- Bug fixes

- It is again possible to make text annotations at smaller font sizes.
- If the toolbars are hidden, using the Apple Pencil will not cause them to appear.

- Support for PDFs which start with a number other than 1, eg. i, ii, iii. This is useful with some professionally produced PDFs such as textbooks.
- Minor bug fixes

- Images on the clipboard can now be pasted as stamp annotations.
- Rectangle annotations can be given a cloudy border style.
- The document no longer moves up and down when the toolbar is shown/hidden.
- Improved Office file conversions.
- The tab key can be used to navigate between form fields.
- Bug fixes and other improvements.

New:
- Right to left language view mode supported.
- Annotation selection menu no longer appears unless tapped.

Fixes:
- There is no longer a delay when selecting an annotation.
- Single page documents in a continuous page view mode are no longer shifted up/
- Annotations made at the top of a document just after the toolbar shows are no longer shifted up.
- The zoom no longer occasionally gets stuck once when trying to zoom out.

New:
- Right to left language view mode supported.
- Annotation selection menu no longer appears unless tapped.

- The zoom no longer occasionally gets stuck once when trying to zoom out.

New:
- Export selected pages from the thumbnails browser to create a new PDF
- Crop mode allows you to remove the margins of a page for better viewing
- While rendering the PDF in dark mode, annotations will use dark-mode colours as they are created
- Eraser erases annotations immediately
- On iPad, the outline/bookmark/annotation panel is resizable

New:
- Export selected pages from the thumbnails browser to create a new PDF
- Crop mode allows you to remove the margins of a page for better viewing
- While rendering the PDF in dark mode, annotations will use dark-mode colours as they are created
- Eraser erases annotations immediately
- On iPad, the outline/bookmark/annotation panel is resizable

New:
- Export selected pages from the thumbnails browser to create a new PDF
- Crop mode allows you to remove the margins of a page for better viewing
- While rendering the PDF in dark mode, annotations will use dark-mode colours as they are created
- Eraser erases annotations immediately
- On iPad, the outline/bookmark/annotation panel is resizable

New:

- Ability to go back after navigating to a new page via a link, outline item, bookmark, etc. 
- Uses a new color picker which allows any color to be selected (iOS 14+).
- A new annotation menu option that duplicates the selected annotation, ie immediately creates a copy next to the original.
- Double-tap zoom behaviour is much improved.
- When a document is displayed in dark mode, annotations use the correct dark mode color representation while they are being created.
- The annotation list now allows you to delete all annotations.
- Improved fidelity for Office documents.
- Bug fixes

NEW:
- Create new documents from the file browser
- Ability to create links on selected text
- Drag annotations between pages
- Change the colour of sticky notes
- Ability to chose size of images when stamping
- Faster reader mode
- Faster opening of documents with a very large number of annotations

- Eliminated pauses/hiccups that could occur
- Eraser works as expected with ink annotations
- and other minor fixes

Xodo has added powerful new features with a "Pro" subscription, now on sale for a limited time. All previously released features are available for free as before.

New Pro Features:

- Convert PDF to Word, Excel, PowerPoint and HTML
- A Favorites Toolbar
- A Redaction Toolbar
- A PDF Form Builder Toolbar
- Annotate in Reader Mode
- Edit PDF Outline
- A "Smart Pen" that will automatically highlight when used over text, and draw ink when not
- Add pages from another PDF
- Export a file-size reduced copy
- Export a permanently cropped copy
- Nested Layers Controls

New free features:

- Document scanner
- Fill and sign toolbar
- Speak highlighted text
- Duplicate pages in the thumbnail viewer
- Rotate text annotations
- Create custom rubber stamps
- Bookmark pages from main viewing screen
- Area and Perimeter measurement labels

- A Favorites Toolbar
- A Redaction Toolbar
- A PDF Form Builder Toolbar
- Annotate in Reader Mode
- Edit PDF Outline
- A "Smart Pen" that will automatically highlight when used over text, and draw ink when not
- Add pages from another PDF
- Export a file-size reduced copy
- Export a permanently cropped copy
- Nested Layers Controls

New free features:

- Document scanner
- Fill and sign toolbar
- Speak highlighted text
- Duplicate pages in the thumbnail viewer
- Rotate text annotations
- Create custom rubber stamps
- Bookmark pages from main viewing screen
- Area and Perimeter measurement labels

6.0.1:
- Bug fixes for PDF outline view

6.0.2:
- fix for text annotations

6.0.3:
- fix for Apple Pencil usage
- fix for a delay between the free trial ending and the pro subscription beginning
